title: @Riot: When you design a champion, do you have emote spams in mind?
body: Many champions have some pretty hilarious emote spams. I personally love it when I spam laugh on AstroNautilus. He looks so darn happy! Anyway, this is just a question I've wanted to ask, since emote spams have become integral to the game.

replies.body: We do take it into consideration. ;D
Was a certain, "Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha." laugh taken into heavy consideration before its release?

> [{quoted}](name=SpecterVonBaren,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=EEHU3g1N,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-09-11T20:23:53.876+0000)
>
> Was a certain, "Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha." laugh taken into heavy consideration before its release?

Nunu Bot Laugh 10 Hours Loop.

watch it.
Good sir! >:( You did not provide a link.

I am still really salty about {{champion:133}} joke spam nerf was the biggest nerf you ever gave her rito :(.

The way it flowed and echo'd before was awesome.

You use to be able to Queue multiple caws from Valor by spamming joke (you could do it faster than this video shows):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h9eMsHZXpMw

And now you can't
Sooo even those who can loop awkward animations are result of deep tought and consideration?

"We designed Vel'Koz for two reasons.

1. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
2. For emote spam.

We're also allowing Phreak to make a champion. You can bet he does puns of damage."
- Riot HUE

> [{quoted}](name=PT Waluigi,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=EEHU3g1N,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-11T13:24:14.050+0000)
>
> "We designed Vel'Koz for two reasons.
> 
> 1. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
> 2. For OH DARN.
> 
> We're also allowing Phreak to make a champion. You can bet he does puns of damage."
> - Riot HUE
